resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: "Notes in Case of a Positive Test Result"

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "The notes and recommended procedure in the case of a positive test result have been revised."

"In addition to the statistics for people who have received at least one vaccine dose and people who are fully vaccinated, you will now also find the number of people who have received a booster vaccination."

"If you want to keep up with the latest developments in the Corona-Warn-App and discuss them with others, you can follow our social media channels. You will now find a social media link on the home screen, under “More”."
"Every element that is moved to the recycle bin is permanently deleted after 30 days. This deletion date is now displayed for every element."

"You will now receive a notification if you have an increased risk of infection even if the app is open. This is intended to prevent you from overlooking a risk warning on the status tab if you are currently using a different tab. In addition, a red dot will appear on the status tab until you open this tab again."
